casebody.data:
WILEY, et al.
v.
L3 COMMUNICATIONS VERTEX AEREOSPACE, LLC 29P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017 Garris Neil Yarborough, Attorney at Law, Fayetteville, H. Addison Winters, Attorney at Law, M. Nan Alessandra, Attorney at Law, Robert M. Kennedy, Jr., Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for L3 Communications Vertex Aereospace, LLC. Lee Tart Malone, Attorney at Law, Dunn, Robert A. Buzzard, Attorney at Law, Lillington, Ryan McKaig, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Wiley, Harry A., et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of February 2017 by M. Nan Alessandra for admission Pro Hac Vice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."
